```{r}
#| echo: false
build <- list.files(
  path = "/srv/build",
  full.names = TRUE
)
for (i in seq_along(build)) {
  cat(
    paste0(
      build[i],
      ": ",
      readLines(build[i]),
      "\n"
    )
  )
}
```
